title: 'Smiling tigers' harass Chinese activists' families
text:
'Smiling tigers' harass Chinese activists' families 6:07am EDT - 01:57 
In China, 'soft' detention measures such as enforced house arrest and harassment are being used in dozens of cases against the families of Chinese activists, according to rights groups.   
In China, 'soft' detention measures such as enforced house arrest and harassment are being used in dozens of cases against the families of Chinese activists, according to rights groups.  //reut.rs/2JU2zj8
